Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to technical corrections of the New York city construction codes and repealing paragraph 4 of subdivision a of section 27-2004 of the administrative code of the city of New York, chapter 1 of the New York city plumbing code, sections 302.1.1, 302.1.1.1 302.2, 302.2, 302.2.1, 302.3, 302.3.1, 302.3.2, 302.4, 302.5, 904.11.4, 904.11.4.1, 1626.3 and BC 2902, of the New York city building code,  tables 302, 403.1, 720.1 (2), 720.1(3), 721.2.3(2), 1507.2, 2305.3.3, 2306.3.2, 2306.4.5, 2308.12.4 and figures 1609.6.2.2 and 2308.12.6(1) of the New York city building code, section 510.8.2 and table 402.2 of the New York city fuel gas code.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Technical corrections of the New York city construction codes.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to the duty of an owner to refrain from harassment of tenants and remedies for the breach of such duty.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
